item.title: Netflix Adding Alfred Hitchcock Collection To Streaming Service Alongside 36 Movie Film Festival
item.description: Netflix is now adding a group of Alfred Hitchcock movies to their streaming service and helping host a film festival celebrating the beloved director.

item.title: After Havoc, Check Out Tom Hardy's Other New Release On Streaming That Has Many Similarities To The Action-Heavy Crime Movie
item.description: Tom Hardy's new action crime movie Havoc is now streaming on Netflix, but the star also has another great option that fans of the movie will love.
